title: Keycloak 24.0.5 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Use a proper FreeMarker template for the new consoles account/ui  * Enhance masking around config-keystore dist/quarkus   BUGS   * front channel logout to clients are not called at Identity Proxy when using    front channel logout to Identity Provider( oidc  * Encountering `NullPointerException` - `KeycloakIdentity.getUserFromToken()`    when running `admin-ui` locally admin/ui  * Admin v2 theme - theme.properties Custom theme scripts not loading admin/ui  * Keycloak CI - failure in Store IT (aurora-postgres) ci  * Custom attributes are removed during UPDATE PROFILE event core  * Upgrade to Keycloak 25 - Table 'USER_CONSENT' is specified twice on    MySQL/MariaDB database core  * Methods of SimpleHttp are after change now too much protected core  * Upgrade to Keycloak 25 - Events bug in UI admin/ui  * Operator fails to patch ingress after update to 25.0.0 operator  * RESTART_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR when login in in private browser window after    25.0.0 update core  * Migration of sessions in KC25 should run only on migration, not on imports  * Documentation : label error for persistent-user-sessions feature flag docs  * Keycloak 25 db guide shows unevaluated "ifeval docs  * keycloak hostname:v2 /admin used on "hostname" instead of "hostname-admin"    admin/ui  * Improvements for ldap test authentication ldap  * partial_import_test fails randomly admin/ui
